title: if i choose to play and drink at the same time
body:
im going to stay away from ranked, i dont play ranked anyways. im most likely going to play with my friends who are also under the influence or don't care.

but if im not with friends, would blind draft be my best option to play in, even if i state so in pregame loby?

because as far as i have learned from my time spent playing league is that blind draft is the "just for fun" mode.

am i wrong about this?

replies.body: the majority of people who have played ranked would agree yes its the "just for fun mode" thats why there is normal draft. I go into normals doing the weirdest shit just to see if it works but know that some people will treat normals like its the finale at worlds and there entire lives hinge on that game.

Thats how noobs be acting when i do warm up games in normal 3s, well be down 30-9 and they wouldnt surrender a 45 minute 3s game.

^ it gives me cancer worse than asbestos
